definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: flow, overflow, [float] (NH id.; so Aram. [[טוּף]], t.op;—Ar. t.afun skin-raft is loan-wd. Frä:220);—

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: Pf. cause to flow over, [[הֵחִיף אֶת־מֵי יַם־סוּף עַל־פְּנֵיהֶם]] De 11:4.
cause to float: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיׇּחֶף הַבַּרְזֶל]] 2Ki 6:6.
